alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Grant; Harper; Major; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 6:58PM CDT until June 15 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Woods County in northwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Harper County in northwestern Oklahoma... Alfalfa County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Grant County in northern Oklahoma... Northwestern Major County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northern Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 658 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles west of Hardtner to 5 miles west of Avard to 6 miles northwest of Mooreland, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alva, Cherokee, Waynoka, Carmen, Freedom, Jet, Aline, Burlington, Dacoma, Amorita, Byron, Lambert, Alabaster Caverns State Park, Avard, Ingersoll, Great Salt Plains Lake, Driftwood, Capron, Waldron, and Hopeton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.

area.areaDesc: Alfalfa; Grant; Harper; Major; Woods; Woodward
